name: TechniLux Apps
description: Community DNS apps for TechniLux UI - Enhanced DNS server applications

apps.name: Advanced Blocking Plus
apps.description: Enhanced version of Advanced Blocking with all original features PLUS support for assigning MULTIPLE groups to each client IP address or subnet. Allows rules from different groups to be aggregated for the same client.
apps.author: TechniLux

apps.name: Network Helper
apps.description: Persistent network client information and hostname mappings. Store custom names, notes, tags, and groups for your network devices. Auto-cleanup of stale entries and bulk import/export support.
apps.author: TechniLux

apps.name: Advanced Forwarding Plus
apps.description: Enhanced version of Advanced Forwarding with all original features PLUS support for assigning MULTIPLE groups to each client IP address or subnet. Allows forwarding rules from different groups to be aggregated for the same client.
apps.author: TechniLux

apps.name: Auto Reverse DNS
apps.description: Automatically creates and maintains PTR records for A/AAAA records in configured zones. Supports per-zone control, duplicate prevention, automatic reverse zone creation, and cluster mode.
apps.author: TechniLux
